channel.title: Sample Feed (created with ROME)
channel.description: This feed has been created using ROME (Java syndication utilities

item.title: Bitcoin drops 9%, nears crucial make-or-break level of $9,000 - CNBC Technology
item.description: Bitcoin drops to just above $9,000, a critical level of support that many analysts are watching.
item.dc:creator: CNBC Technology

item.title: Samsung is cashing in on bitcoin mining - CNN Money
item.description: Samsung is getting in on the cryptocurrency craze.
item.dc:creator: CNN Money

item.title: Worries Grow That the Price of Bitcoin Is Being Propped Up - NY Time Technology
item.description: When the price of Bitcoin goes down, activity on an influential exchange pumps it back up. That has investors and regulators asking questions.
item.dc:creator: NY Time Technology

item.title: Line is launching its own bitcoin exchange - CNN Money
item.description: Popular messaging app Line plans to let its more than 170 million users trade virtual currencies through their smartphones.
item.dc:creator: CNN Money

item.title: The Shift: Kodak’s Dubious Cryptocurrency Gamble - NY Time Technology
item.description: What’s a 130-year-old photo company doing dabbling in cryptocurrency? Either revolutionizing digital rights management or trying to make a quick buck.
item.dc:creator: NY Time Technology

item.title: Facebook Bans Ads for Bitcoin and Other Cryptocurrencies - NY Time Technology
item.description: The social network said it wanted to prevent misleading or deceptive promotional practices.
item.dc:creator: NY Time Technology
